title: MEDICAL ATTENTION
fullText:
Measures shall be taken to protect personnel from potential hazards. Any person who receives an
electric shock or is involved in an electrical incident causing injury should seek medical attention
immediately. Guidance on how to manage electric shock situations is given in Appendix C.
NOTE The full effects of an electric shock or an electrical incident might not be immediately obvious; symptoms
can materialize later. If they require medical attention, injured persons should be transported by others.
